name: Super Warrior Revenge: Dragon
description:
Welcome to "Super Warrior Revenge : Dragon" a game for fighting with enemies, is an incredible 3d street fighting game, pace of energetic combos will leave you speechless, If you are fan of martial arts, karate, boxing, wrestling then this future fight definitely for you.

Become a true street fighting hero in this ultimate kings of street fighting club 3d game. it gives you a chance to relive a classic arcade future fighting game, how can you miss?

is enjoyable game with great graphics and good quality super combos combat. True heroes fight on street with no limits, feel the power and strength , Its your time to master your hero warrior killer instinct and revenge.

Chose your character wisely and compete the opponents in arena. Enjoy an unprecedented and devastating brave learn to fight combat experience. Face various enemies, use quick reflexes and special moves,

FEATURES :
- Eye catch nice fight graphic
- Easy to play game play
- Many characters anime support
- Many bosses fighting support
- Many super skill fighting support
